modal-delete-file-text: Do you really want to delete {0}?
no-valid-file: No valid file! Was it a directory?
search-string-too-short: Too short - requires at least 3 characters
encryption-error-try-relogin: Error on decryption! Perhaps try to re-login?
modal-history-title: History of the currently selected day
use-selected-history-as-default: Set selected history version as newest text?
export-started-1: Zip file is being created. This may take a few minutes depending on the size.
export-started-2: IMPORTANT: Do NOT reload the page during this process!
error-uploading-file: Error on uploading file! Perhaps it is too large?
backup-codes-description-1: Backup codes work like one-time passwords. They can always be used instead of the normal password (e.g. if you forgot it), but only once.
backup-codes-description-2: When you change your password, all backup codes will be deleted and you will have to create new ones.
backup-codes-created-2: Write down the Backup Codes NOW. After closing this window you will not be able to view them again, but you can always create new ones.
backup-codes-deleted: Backup codes have been deleted. You need to create new ones!
few-backup-codes-left: Only {0} backup codes left. You should create new ones.
x-backup-codes-left: You used a backup code. There are {0} more left.
update-installed-reload: New update has been installed. Please reload the page!
remove-day: Delete all logs and files of this day.
modal-remove-day-header: Delete all data of this day?
modal-remove-day-text: Do you want to permanently delete all logs and files from {0}?
export-data-description: Creates a ZIP file for download that contains all texts and uploaded files. The content is decrypted!
import-data-description: Select your (previously exported) ZIP file to upload the data. The texts contained in it will be handled as the newest entries. The import might take a few minutes (depending on the size).
start-import: Choose ZIP file and start import
tooltip-remove-bookmark: Remove bookmark (day is no longer orange)
